com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.actions

Interface MovementAction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WaitAction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupActionWaitDelay, GroupActionWaitForever, GroupActionWaitPathFinding, GroupActionWaitState, GroupActionWaitTicks, GroupActionWaitTill, MemberActionLaunch, MemberActionLaunchDirection, MemberActionLaunchLocation, MemberActionWaitDistance, MemberActionWaitLocation, MemberActionWaitOccupied

    public interface MovementAction
    Represents an action that controls train movement

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isMovementSuppressed()
      Tells the train whether movement control should be suppressed.

    • Method Detail

      • isMovementSuppressed

        boolean isMovementSuppressed()
        Tells the train whether movement control should be suppressed. If this action controls velocity/position changes, this should return True.
        Returns:
        True if movement is suppressed, False if not
